body:
If you cannot reproduce the crash after correcting the race, please close
the issue.

Thanks

Dave

On Tue, 5 May 2015 13:29 bjsuo <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Yes ,the program has a data race ,but I used lock already.
> The code is
> n.Lock()
> defer n.Unlock()
>
>     n.clientMap[client.LongIdentifier] = client
>
